short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically you keeps track of your frequently visited webtoons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is an extension witch lets you keep track of your frequently visited webtoons.
You can add any webtoon that you are currently reading, and the extension automatically fetches if there is a next episode available. You han also mark finished webttons complete, and hide the completed ones from the list. There is a handy import / export functionality to easily back up and share your collection.
